DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pharmacological effect , safety pharmacokinetic TAS-303 female patient Stress Urinary Incontinence .
DOC.brief_title: A Study TAS-303 Female Patients With Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.detailed_description: This study double-blind , placebo-controlled crossover study . The main purpose study evaluate Urethral Pressure Profile Parameters Stress Urinary Incontinence patient receive single dose TAS-303 Placebo .
DOC.criteria: Key Patient symptom Stress Urinary Incontinence ( SUI ) least 12 week prior study entry Patient weight least 45 kg body mass index ( BMI ) range 18.030.0 kg/m2 , inclusive , screen Patient positive 1hour pad weight test screen Patient least 2 incontinence episode per week . Key Patient predominant primary urge incontinence accord investigator judgment Patient prior surgical SUI treatment Patient diagnose Pelvic Organ Prolapse Patient currently take medication , take medication last 4 week , urinary incontinence effect urinary output function include anticholinergic antihistamine antianxiety medication . Patient positive pregnancy test
